backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Microsoft SilverFlow LLM API - Real API calls
original_prompt: Prepare a brief for my upcoming meeting with customer Beta and include a dossier for each customer attendee and the topics they are most interested in. Include a background on their company.

gutts.name: Identify Upcoming Meeting
gutts.capability: Locate the user's upcoming meeting with customer Beta in the calendar.
gutts.user_goal: Find the specific meeting to prepare the brief for.
gutts.evidence: Extract meeting titled 'Meeting with Beta' scheduled in the user's calendar.

gutts.name: Extract Meeting Details
gutts.capability: Retrieve date, time, location, and attendees from the identified meeting.
gutts.user_goal: Get all relevant details of the meeting.
gutts.evidence: List attendees: Alice Smith, John Doe; Date: June 15, 2024; Location: Zoom.

gutts.name: Identify Customer Attendees
gutts.capability: Filter attendees to identify which belong to customer Beta.
gutts.user_goal: Know which attendees are from customer Beta.
gutts.evidence: Alice Smith and John Doe are confirmed as Beta employees.

gutts.name: Generate Meeting Brief Structure
gutts.capability: Create a structured template for the meeting brief.
gutts.user_goal: Have a clear format for the meeting brief.
gutts.evidence: Sections: Meeting Overview, Attendee Dossiers, Topics of Interest, Company Background.

gutts.name: Create Meeting Overview
gutts.capability: Summarize meeting purpose, date, time, and participants.
gutts.user_goal: Provide a concise meeting overview in the brief.
gutts.evidence: Overview: Meeting with Beta on June 15, 2024, via Zoom. Participants: Alice Smith, John Doe.

gutts.name: Generate Attendee Dossier
gutts.capability: For each customer attendee, compile a dossier with name, role, and relevant background.
gutts.user_goal: Understand each attendee's profile and context.
gutts.evidence: Alice Smith: VP of Marketing at Beta, 10 years experience in B2B marketing.

gutts.name: Identify Topics of Interest per Attendee
gutts.capability: Determine topics each customer attendee is most interested in based on past interactions or data.
gutts.user_goal: Know what topics to focus on for each attendee.
gutts.evidence: Alice Smith: Interested in product roadmap and marketing analytics.

gutts.name: Compile Company Background
gutts.capability: Generate a background summary for customer Beta, including industry, size, and recent news.
gutts.evidence: Beta: SaaS company in marketing analytics, 500 employees, recently launched AI-driven platform.

gutts.name: Assemble Final Brief Document
gutts.capability: Combine meeting overview, attendee dossiers, topics of interest, and company background into a cohesive brief.
gutts.user_goal: Have a complete, well-structured meeting brief.
gutts.evidence: Final brief includes all sections in a clear, professional format.
